message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $20,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer.  I'm interested but $20,000 is a bit out of my price range. Would you consider $10,000?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $20,000 represents fair value, I'm willing to come down to $17,000.  I believe this price reflects a good balance.
Thanks for considering my previous offer, Alice.  I'm getting closer to a price point where I can make this work.  Would you be willing to meet me at $13,000?
Bob, I'm glad we're finding common ground. How about we settle on $15,500? That's my final offer.
